OrgName.entry: HER MAJESTYS REVENUE AND CUSTOMS, SOUTH YORKSHIRE AREA

Desc.entry: Deals with various aspects of tax including PAYE for employees, Self-Assessment for the self-employed, Tax Credits, Child Benefit and Pension Credits. Can help with any enquiry, even if the client's records are held in a different tax office. Also covers VAT, international trade activities and all duties performed by Customs and Excise, including smuggling, special criminal investigation, black economy, etc.

Langs.entry: Translation service available in over 45 languages
